# Auto generated by Nixsm
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8.9)

project(tutils CXX)

if( NOT TUTILS_LIBRARIES )
	unset(TUTILS_DIR CACHE)
	unset(TUTILS_INCLUDE_DIRS CACHE)
	unset(TUTILS_LIBRARIES CACHE)
endif()

set(TUTILS_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} CACHE PATH "tutils dir" ${SHOULD_FORCE})
set(TUTILS_INCLUDE_DIRS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include CACHE PATH "tutils include dir" ${SHOULD_FORCE})
set(TUTILS_LIBRARIES ${PROJECT_NAME} CACHE FILEPATH "tutils libraries"	${SHOULD_FORCE})

include_directories(
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
    include
)
file(GLOB_RECURSE sources ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.cc ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.c)
file(GLOB_RECURSE includes ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/*.h)

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} SHARED ${sources} ${includes})

install(TARGETS ${PROJECT_NAME} DESTINATION lib)
install(FILES ${includes} DESTINATION include)
